profile.name: EL OUADIFI Othmane
profile.headline: Data Scientist | Machine Learning Engineer
profile.summary: A 3rd year engineering student at ENSIMAG. Particularly interested in machine learning, deep learning, generative AI, applied mathematics, and numerical modeling. Passionate about solving complex problems and technological innovation.

projects.name: Project One
projects.description: Short description of your project and what problem it solves.

experience.description: Comparative study and optimization of Connected Component Labeling (CCL) algorithms for real-time binary image processing.
highlights: Comparative study and optimization of CCL algorithms for real-time binary image processing
Development and benchmarking of three C/C++ implementations
Implementation of comprehensive testing infrastructure with statistical analysis
Sequential C algorithm optimization with GPU transposition preparation

experience.description: Developed an MCP server that helps STM32 developers debug their code and propose workarounds by analyzing their project and retrieving errata that affects their part number, helping users save time by not having to manually read through errata sheets.
highlights: Prompt injection capabilities for dynamic AI interactions
Built Neo4j database storing relationships between series, part numbers, peripherals, and errata
Errata retrieval tool for part-specific technical details
Developed VSCode extension enabling users to connect directly to remote MCP server via HTTP protocol

education.degree: Engineering degree in Computer Science and Data Science
